description: Detects suspicious Windows Error Reporting manager (wermgr.exe) process patterns - suspicious parents / children, execution folders, command lines etc.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious WERMGR Process Patterns
query: (((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\wermgr.exe" AND process.executable.text:("*\\nslookup.exe" OR "*\\ipconfig.exe" OR "*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe" OR "*\\whoami.exe" OR "*\\netstat.exe" OR "*\\systeminfo.exe" OR "*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe"))) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\wermgr.exe" AND (NOT process.executable.text:("C\:\\Windows\\System32\\*" OR "C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*" OR "C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\*")))))
